description: Not far from the Pantheon, this original restaurant arranged over four floors serves the type of fine Chinese cuisine which has graced official banquets in China ever since the time of Chairman Mao. The menu also features some surprisingly modern Asian dishes, making this restaurant a must for fans of Chinese cuisine!
